ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kill-stealing bards?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, that s the thing.  There are just so many possibilities that you can t really set out to test them all.  At first I thought the pet getting the
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 15 Mar 2000, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> Shouldn't one pulse of our CoD be easily able to KS then? If pets aren't
> part of the equation it should be easy to test. If pets are involved maybe
> it would be easiest to test with a level 3 bard and a level 3 pet class.
> Have the bard CoD it once then step back and let the other caster kill it
> with pet. To test if its overlapping DoT's, use a necro who can DoT for
> more than a single cycle of CoD.

Well, that's the thing. There are just so many possibilities
that you can't really set out to test them all. At first I
thought the pet getting the killing blow was the cause. But I
checked my logfiles and the pet made the killing blow only two
of the times. Third time, a player did.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
